title: The Extra Episode: Minimum wage, drinking in Scotland and identical twins.
description: We explore the numbers behind the new minimum wage announcements, whether drinking is going up or down in Scotland, the truth about squeezing people onto the Isle of Wight and how long one identical twin lives after the other twin dies.  You’ll want to hear our special extra episode.
itunes:subtitle: Exploring how long one identical twin lives after the other twin dies.
itunes:summary: We explore the numbers behind the new minimum wage announcements, whether drinking is going up or down in Scotland, the truth about squeezing people onto the Isle of Wight and how long one identical twin lives after the other twin dies.
